examples: Buses take priority over other vehicles on the road.
The bus hit the bridge.
The bus can take 60 passengers.
Buses to Oxford run every half hour.
A bus appeared around the corner.
words.defineEn: a large vehicle that carries many passengers by road
words.defineVi: một chiếc xe lớn chở nhiều hành khách bằng đường bộ

examples: The plane holds about 300 passengers.
The plane holds about 300 passengers.
We changed planes in Miami.
Your plane leaves in ten minutes.
To take a cab/plane.
words.defineEn: a winged flying vehicle driven by one or more engines
words.defineVi: một phương tiện bay có cánh được điều khiển bởi một hoặc nhiều động cơ

examples: The taxi station is just a short walk from my apartment.
I took a taxi from my house to the train station.
The taxi driver helped me with my luggage.
The taxi dropped me off at the entrance of the restaurant.
The taxi driver drove us to the airport quickly and safely.
words.defineEn: a car that has a driver who gets paid for taking people to places
words.defineVi: một chiếc xe có tài xế được trả tiền để đưa mọi người đến những nơi

examples: The train’s here at long last.
The train traveled through beautiful countryside.
Trains between London and Brighton run throughout the day.
To hold the train.
The slow train arrived at the station behind schedule.
words.defineEn: a series of connected carriages or wagons pulled along a railroad line by a locomotive
words.defineVi: một loạt các toa xe hoặc toa xe được kết nối với nhau do đầu máy kéo dọc theo một tuyến đường sắt

examples: The coach always keeps a few tricks up his sleeve.
Coach's career is on a sticky wicket.
The coach dug his own grave when he publicly insulted the team's owner.
The coach was determined to get his message through to the team before the big game.
The coach tore the player out of the game after he made a mistake.
words.defineEn: an instructor or trainer in sport; someone who trains a person or team in sport
words.defineVi: một người hướng dẫn hoặc huấn luyện viên trong thể thao; một người đào tạo một người hoặc đội trong thể thao

examples: The old tramlines are still there but now no trams run on them.
The small tram is in front of a cinema.
"There is a fire engine, a vintage car, a horse and carriage and a small tram."
And I constantly saw trams with tourists go through Warner Brothers and people were always wanting to see the Friends fountain, the iconic Friends fountain.
At eighteen, she was riding a bus when it collided with a tram and left her severely injured.
words.defineEn: a vehicle that is powered by electricity and moves on rails in a street, used for transporting passengers
words.defineVi: một phương tiện chạy bằng điện và di chuyển trên đường ray trên đường phố, được sử dụng để vận chuyển hành khách
